Sentencas: This study represents the results of the analysis and optimization of an integrated system for cogenerating electricity and freshwater.
Titulo: Systematic analysis and multi-objective optimization of an integrated power and freshwater production cycle

Sentencas: This setup consists of a Solid Oxide Fuel cell (SOFC) for producing electricity.
Titulo: Systematic analysis and multi-objective optimization of an integrated power and freshwater production cycle

Sentencas: Unburned fuel of the SOFC is burned in the afterburner to increase the temperature of the SOFC's outlet gasses and operate a Gas turbine (GT) to produce additional power and operate the air compressor.
Titulo: Systematic analysis and multi-objective optimization of an integrated power and freshwater production cycle

Sentencas: At the bottom of this cycle, a combined setup of a Multi-Effect Desalination (MED) and Reverse Osmosis (RO) is considered to produce freshwater from the unused heat capacity of the GT's exhaust gasses.
Titulo: Systematic analysis and multi-objective optimization of an integrated power and freshwater production cycle

Sentencas: Also, a Stirling engine is used in the fuel supply line to increase the fuel's temperature.
Titulo: Systematic analysis and multi-objective optimization of an integrated power and freshwater production cycle

Sentencas: Using LNG and the Stirling engine will replace the fuel compressor with a pump which increases the system performance and eliminates the need for the expansion valve.
Titulo: Systematic analysis and multi-objective optimization of an integrated power and freshwater production cycle

Sentencas: To study the system performance a mathematical model is developed in Engineering Equation Solver (EES) program.
Titulo: Systematic analysis and multi-objective optimization of an integrated power and freshwater production cycle

Sentencas: Then, the system's simulated data from the EES has been sent to MATLAB to promote the best operating condition based on the optimization criteria.
Titulo: Systematic analysis and multi-objective optimization of an integrated power and freshwater production cycle

Sentencas: An energetic, exergetic, economic, and environmental analysis has been performed and a Nondominated Sorting Genetic Algorithm (NSGA-II) is used to achieve the goal.
Titulo: Systematic analysis and multi-objective optimization of an integrated power and freshwater production cycle

Sentencas: The two-objective optimization is performed to maximize the exergetic efficiency of the proposed system while minimizing the system's total cost of production.
Titulo: Systematic analysis and multi-objective optimization of an integrated power and freshwater production cycle

Sentencas: This cost is a weighted distribution of the Levelized Cost of Electricity (LCOE) and Levelized Cost of freshwater (LCOW).
Titulo: Systematic analysis and multi-objective optimization of an integrated power and freshwater production cycle

Sentencas: The results showed that the exergetic and energetic efficiencies of the system can reach 73.5% and 69.06% at the optimum point.
Titulo: Systematic analysis and multi-objective optimization of an integrated power and freshwater production cycle

Sentencas: The total electricity production of the system is 99 MW.
Titulo: Systematic analysis and multi-objective optimization of an integrated power and freshwater production cycle

Sentencas: The production cost is 11.71 Cents/kWh, of which 1.04 Cents/kWh is emission-related and environmental taxes.
Titulo: Systematic analysis and multi-objective optimization of an integrated power and freshwater production cycle

Sentencas: The freshwater production rate is 42.44 kg/s which costs 4.38 USD/m(3).
Titulo: Systematic analysis and multi-objective optimization of an integrated power and freshwater production cycle
